item.title: Ticket #320 (Database doesn't upgrade, errors on 4 tablerows) created
item.dc:creator: Rob Mientjes
item.description: After trying to upgrade my 1.0.2 to 1.3-alpha3 (build 9-26-2004), the database errors on me: unknown column 'autoload' (twice in 'field list', once in 'where clause'), unknown column 'guid'.

item.title: Ticket #319 (comment_type() not work.) created
item.dc:creator: anonymousbugger
item.description: In recent CVS, comment_type() not work. It is caused by empty comment_type field at wp_comments table. also, comment_type() function need change to use DB query.

item.title: Ticket #317 (Multiple copies of a plugin can be adding, leading to fatal errors) closed
item.dc:creator: michel v
item.description:
20:

Added a check to avoid activating the same plugin twice, and changed include() into include_once() to avoid including the same plugin file twice.

item.title: Ticket #318 (WP causing "403 Forbidden" error when creating .htaccess on server ...) updated
item.dc:creator: mark
item.description: Only way to restore access is delete .htaccess file.

item.title: Ticket #318 (WP causing "403 Forbidden" error when creating .htaccess on server ...) updated
item.dc:creator: mark
item.description:
Clicking the permalink suboption creates the .htaccess file and writes:

# BEGIN WordPress RewriteEngine On RewriteBase /wp-cvs/

# END WordPress

Attempts to load any page located in the directory where the .htaccess is results in a "403 Forbidden" error.

item.title: Ticket #318 (WP causing "403 Forbidden" error when creating .htaccess on server ...) created
item.dc:creator: mark
item.description: Fresh checkout of CVS (09/26/04 11:34 a.m. EDT). My host doesn't allow for mod_rewrite (and actually has problems with .htaccess period).
